TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Grammar extends System.Object

summary.span: A runtime object that references a speech recognition grammar, which an application can use to define the constraints for speech recognition.

span.span: A runtime object that references a speech recognition grammar, which an application can use to define the constraints for speech recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語音辨識文法是一組規則或條件約束定義語音辨識引擎可辨識為有意義的輸入。A speech recognition grammar is a set of rules or constraints that define what a speech recognition engine can recognize as meaningful input. 如需有關建立和使用語音辨識文法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 語音辨識](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)，[使用 XML 建立文法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1)，[建立文法使用 GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)，並[建立使用 SrgsGrammar 文法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)。For more information about creating and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919), [Create Grammars Using XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1), [Create Grammars Using GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae), and [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906). 您撰寫文法之後，您必須建置到物件可以載入語音辨識引擎和您的應用程式可以使用在執行階段，來管理語音辨識。After you author a grammar, you must build it into a object that a speech recognition engine can load and that your application can use at runtime to manage speech recognition. 您可以使用建構函式來建立執行個體或物件，或從檔案或其中包含描述的文法支援的格式。You can use a constructor to create a instance from a or a object, or from a file or a that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format. 支援的格式如下：Supported formats include the following: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 文法建構函式接受其引數中的 XML 格式文法檔案編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 文法。Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 應用程式的語音辨識引擎，因為受或物件，可以載入多個語音辨識文法。An application's speech recognition engine, as managed by a or object, can load multiple speech recognition grammars. 應用程式可以獨立啟用或停用個別的文法屬性，並修改透過辨識行為屬性，例如和屬性。The application can independently enable or disable individual grammars by setting the property, and modify recognition behavior through properties, such as the and properties. 文法輸入符合透過文法的路徑時引發事件。The grammar’s event is raised when input matches a path through the grammar. > [!NOTE] > 若要確認任何 URI 或用來建置的 DLL 的安全性最佳的作法是物件。It is a best practice to verify the safety of any URI or DLL used to build a object. > > Windows 和語音平台提供的建構的應用程式的安全性從 DLL 或文法，支援指令碼的執行個體。Windows and the Speech platform provide security for applications constructing a instance from a DLL or from a grammar that supports scripting. > > 在指令碼如同從網頁下載，一律會執行物件`Internet Zone`。Scripts in objects are always run as if downloaded from a web page in the `Internet Zone`. Common Language Runtime (CLR) 隔離載入取得文法定義的任何 DLL。The Common Language Runtime (CLR) isolates any DLL loaded to obtain a grammar definition. ## Examples 下列範例會建構從語音辨識文法的 XML 檔案 (cities.xml) 中定義的物件。The following example constructs a object from a speech recognition grammar defined in a XML file (cities.xml). Cities.xml 檔案的內容會出現在下列 XML 範例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the following XML example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file and return the grammar object. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用建構函式來建立執行個體或物件，或從檔案或其中包含描述的文法支援的格式。You can use a constructor to create a instance from a or object, or from a file or a that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format. 支援的格式如下：Supported formats include the following: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 文法建構函式接受其引數中的 XML 格式文法檔案編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 文法。Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 語音辨識文法可以定義根規則。A speech recognition grammar can define a root rule. 若要建立物件，指定要作為其根規則，哪一個規則使用的建構函式可接受`ruleName`參數。To create a object that specifies which rule to use as its root rule, use a constructor that accepts the `ruleName` parameter. 若要建立指定的基底 URI 來解析相對規則參考的物件使用的建構函式`baseUri`參數。To create a object that specifies a base URI to resolve relative rule references, use a constructor that takes the `baseUri` parameter.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from a .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始設定處理常式中，不會通過任何參數，並描述不應定義需要引數初始化處理常式。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 這個建構函式可以建立從下列格式的執行個體：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 這個建構函式會編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 格式文法檔案。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. SRGS 文法可以定義根規則。An SRGS grammar can define a root rule. 若要建立從資料流物件，指定根規則，請使用或建構函式。To create a object from a stream and specify a root rule, use the or constructor. 若要建立從資料流物件，並指定用來解析相對規則參考的基底 URI 使用建構函式。To create a object from a stream and specify a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, use the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會從本機 SRGS 檔案 (cities.xml) 使用檔案資料流建立語音辨識文法。The following example creates a speech recognition grammar from a local SRGS file (cities.xml) using a file stream. Cities.xml 檔案的內容會出現下列 C# 範例。The content of the cities.xml file appears following C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from an I/O stream and // return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromStream() { string fileName = @"c:\temp\cities.xml"; Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open)); citiesGrammar.Name = "Stream Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始設定處理常式中，不會通過任何參數，並描述不應定義需要引數初始化處理常式。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 這個建構函式可以建立從下列格式的執行個體：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 這個建構函式會編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 格式文法檔案。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. SRGS 文法可以定義根規則。An SRGS grammar can define a root rule. 若要建立物件從字串並指定根規則，請使用建構函式。To create a object from a string and specify a root rule, use the constructor. 若要建立物件，指定用來解析相對規則參考的基底 URI 開啟檔案，在檔案資料流，然後使用建構函式。To create a object that specifies a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, open the file in a file stream and use the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會從本機 SRGS 檔案來建置載入語音辨識文法物件。The following example loads a speech recognition grammar from a local SRGS file to build a object. Cities.xml 檔案的內容會出現在下面的 C# 範例的 XML 範例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the XML example that follows the C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file and // return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始設定處理常式中，不會通過任何參數，並描述不應定義需要引數初始化處理常式。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 這個建構函式可以建立從下列格式的執行個體：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 這個建構函式會編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 格式文法檔案。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 若要建立從資料流，並指定用來解析相對規則參考的基底 URI 使用建構函式。To create a from a stream and specify a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, use the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會從檔案資料流載入本機 SRGS 檔案 (cities.xml)，並指定要做為文法根規則。The following example loads a local SRGS file (cities.xml) from a file stream and specifies a rule to use as the root of the grammar. Cities.xml 檔案的內容會出現在下面的 C# 範例的 XML 範例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the XML example that follows the C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from an I/O stream, use a specific // rule as the root of the grammar, and return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromStream2() { FileInfo file = new FileInfo(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(file.OpenRead(), "Main"); citiesGrammar.Name = "Stream Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始設定處理常式中，不會通過任何參數，並描述不應定義需要引數初始化處理常式。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 這個建構函式可以建立從下列格式的執行個體：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 這個建構函式會編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 格式文法檔案。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 若要建立，指定用來解析相對規則參考、 開啟檔案的檔案資料流和使用的基底 URI建構函式。To create a that specifies a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, open a file stream for the file and use the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會從檔案載入本機 SRGS 檔案 (cities.xml)，並指定要做為文法根規則。The following example loads a local SRGS file (cities.xml) from a file and specifies a rule to use as the root of the grammar. Cities.xml 檔案的內容會出現在下面的 C# 範例的 XML 範例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the XML example that follows the C# example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file, use a specific // rule as the root of the grammar, and return the new grammar. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile2() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml", "Main"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始設定處理常式中，不會通過任何參數，並描述不應定義需要引數初始化處理常式。This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments. 這個建構函式可以建立從下列格式的執行個體：This constructor can create a instance from the following formats: - 符合 W3C XML 格式檔[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 編譯成具有.cfg 副檔名的二進位檔案的文法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 這個建構函式會編譯成二進位格式載入和耗用量最佳化語音辨識引擎的 XML 格式文法檔案。This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 您可以減少的建構所需的時間量所編譯的文法事先使用其中一種 XML 格式的文法物件方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 這個建構函式不會驗證`baseUri`。This constructor does not validate `baseUri`. 不過，`LoadGrammar`方法或物件擲回例外狀況，如果它無法解決所有文法描述中的規則參考。However, the `LoadGrammar` method of a or object throws an exception if it cannot resolve all of the rule references in the grammar description. 如果`baseUri`不是`null`，則`LoadGrammar`方法會使用 URI 來解析任何否則無法解析的規則參考。If `baseUri` is not `null`, the `LoadGrammar` method uses the URI to resolve any rule references that it cannot otherwise resolve. 如果`baseUri`代表檔案，則`LoadGrammar`嘗試解析相對規則參考時，會使用指定的檔案和檔案的目錄。If `baseUri` represents a file, then the `LoadGrammar` uses both the designated file and the file's directory when it attempts to resolve relative rule references. ## Examples 下列範例會從檔案資料流載入本機 SRGS 檔案 (shuttle.xml)。The following example loads a local SRGS file (shuttle.xml) from a file stream. 檔案包含相對規則參考 cities.xml 檔案中的規則，並指定要用來解析規則參考的基底 URI。The file contains a relative rule reference to a rule in the cities.xml file, and specifies a base URI to use to resolve the rule reference. Shuttle.xml 和 cities.xml 檔案的內容會出現在遵循 C# 範例的 XML 範例。The content of the shuttle.xml and cities.xml files appears in the XML examples that follow the C# example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromStream3() { FileInfo file = new FileInfo(@".\shuttle.xml"); Uri baseUri = new Uri(@"file://c:\temp\"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(file.OpenRead(), null, baseUri); citiesGrammar.Name = "Stream Cities Grammar 3"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml Can I get a shuttle in ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether a can be used by a speech recognizer to perform recognition.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether a can be used by a speech recognizer to perform recognition.

value.span: 屬性會傳回如果語音辨識器可以執行辨識使用語音辨識文法中; 否則這個屬性傳回。

span.span: The property returns if a speech recognizer can perform recognition using the speech recognition grammar; otherwise the property returns .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool IsStg { get; }
.property instance bool IsStg
Protected Friend Overridable ReadOnly Property IsStg As Boolean
protected public: virtual property bool IsStg { bool get(); };
member this.IsStg : bool

summary.span: Gets whether a grammar is strongly typed.

span.span: Gets whether a grammar is strongly typed.

value.span: 屬性會傳回如果文法為強型別; 否則屬性會傳回。

span.span: The property returns if the grammar is strongly-typed; otherwise the property returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強型別物件 (`IsStg`等於`true`) 可以傳回至用戶端應用程式的強型別結果 （物件，而非原始文字）。A strongly-typed object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application. 例如，可能會傳回強型別文法物件而不是原始的已辨識輸入。For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return objects rather than raw recognized input. 您可以將程式碼附加至文法的規則，以實作強型別文法。You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar. 當辨識引擎會處理任何指定的規則，採用為輸入目前的部分結果，會執行相關聯的程式碼，且文字資訊豐富的型別物件。As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects. 這可讓用戶端若要更輕鬆地使用增強的語意檢查，支援多個文化特性，以及內部的文法邏輯。This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic. 執行個體的強型別物件通常做為組件中的資源取得的 Common Language Runtime (CLR)。Instances of strongly-typed objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a of the Common Language Runtime (CLR). 用來支援不同語言的當地語系化的類型是這類的範例物件。The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such objects.

span.para: 繼承自的強型別文法需要覆寫預設行為，也就是傳回。
Strongly-typed grammars inheriting from need to override the default behavior of , which is to return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當地語系化取得文法`LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType`是通常是強型別 (請參閱如需有關強型別文法)。Localized grammars obtained with `LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType` are typically strongly-typed (see for more information on strongly typed grammars). 如果`onInitParameters`為 null 參考 （在 Visual Basic 中的任何動作） 的當地語系化文法應該有初始設定方法或採用任何引數的方法。If `onInitParameters` is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) the localized grammar should have either no initialization method, or a method that takes no arguments.

param.name: parameters
param.span: Parameters to be passed to initialize the strongly-typed grammar.This parameter may be null.

span.span: Parameters to be passed to initialize the strongly-typed grammar.This parameter may be null.

summary.span: The method initializes a strongly-typed grammar.

span.span: The method initializes a strongly-typed grammar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強型別物件 (`IsStg`等於`true`) 可以傳回至用戶端應用程式的強型別結果 （物件，而非原始文字）。A strongly-typed object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application. 例如，可能會傳回強型別文法物件而不是原始的已辨識輸入。For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return objects rather than raw recognized input. 您可以將程式碼附加至文法的規則，以實作強型別文法。You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar. 當辨識引擎會處理任何指定的規則，採用為輸入目前的部分結果，會執行相關聯的程式碼，且文字資訊豐富的型別物件。As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects. 這可讓用戶端若要更輕鬆地使用增強的語意檢查，支援多個文化特性，以及內部的文法邏輯。This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic. 執行個體的強型別物件通常做為組件中的資源取得的 Common Language Runtime (CLR)。Instances of strongly-typed objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a of the Common Language Runtime (CLR). 用來支援不同語言的當地語系化的類型是這類的範例物件。The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such objects.

span.para: 如果強型別文法需要初始化、應該在建構函式或初始設定方法呼叫。
If a strongly-typed grammar requires initialization, should be called in a constructor or an initialization method.

MemberSignature.Value: public float Weight { get; set; }
.property instance float32 Weight
Public Property Weight As Single
public: property float Weight { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.Weight : single with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the weight value of a object.

span.span: Gets or sets the weight value of a object.

value.span: 屬性會傳回浮點值，表示處理語音輸入時辨識引擎執行個體應指派給文法的相對加權。

span.span: The property returns a floating point value indicating the relative weight that a recognition engine instance should assign to the grammar when processing speech input.
The range is from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive.
The default is 1.0.
